author: {'steamid': '76561198200026405', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 129, 'playtime_forever': 36, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 36, 'last_played': 1709941998}
review:
[h1] Darkness My Old Friend? More Like Enemy! [/h1]

Blackout Z: Slaughterhouse Edition [b] promises [/b] a thrilling top-down zombie survival experience. Unfortunately, the reality falls short. While the concept of juggling flashlight battery, ammo scarcity, and hordes of undead is interesting, the execution is a frustrating mess. Let's move on to pros & cons part!

+) Full achievements on 0.6 hrs for me, pretty fast if you looking for them achievements!

-) The core mechanic of the limited flashlight beam creates more annoyance than tension.  Sure, it adds a layer of challenge, but the environment is just too dark. You'll spend more time scrambling for light than strategically blasting zombies.
-) The environmental hazards, particularly the deadly saw blades, feel cheap.  They blend into the darkness, and one wrong move leads to instant death. This doesn't encourage skillful play.

Blackout Z: Slaughterhouse Edition might hold a sliver of appeal for fans of ultra-punishing, score-chasing arcade experiences. But for most players, the frustration outweighs the fun. Would not recommend if you are not here for achievements.

author: {'steamid': '76561199506746300', 'num_games_owned': 86, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 147, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 147, 'last_played': 1709223694}

author: {'steamid': '76561198343319831', 'num_games_owned': 48, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 276, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 276, 'last_played': 1709093219}
review:
纯恶心玩家的游戏,
1.武器设计垃圾,除了手枪和AK稍微好点,别的武器连打尸群都困难,要么子弹不够,要么伤害不够
2.奇葩都设定,被丧尸咬了后丧尸居然跟主人公同一站位,主人公无法直接打到咬人的丧尸,必须拉开身位才可以碰到丧尸,然而这会导致极其容易踩到陷阱
3.迷惑的道具刷新,这游戏必须在每个光源耗尽之前找到别的光源才有办法继续玩下去,不然摸黑玩基本上等死,然而道具刷新有时候一直没有光源,有时候一直没有子弹,跑到死都找不到那种
4.充满制作人的恶意,接上面说的道具问题,很多时候道具刷在陷阱上面,光源会逐渐熄灭,加上陷阱本身的配色,根本看不清楚,过去捡道具直接就死了
5.粗糙的模型判定,陷阱判定本身比陷阱图片范围大,经常莫名其妙就会死掉
6.莫名其妙的惩罚机制,被丧尸打到后,触碰陷阱是没有无敌帧的,但是碰到丧尸是有一点无敌帧的,这本身很好,然而无敌帧的时候居然不让捡道具,你想趁着无敌的时候去捡道具,下一次丧尸跟着你伤害判定会比你捡道具判定快,你只能一直挨打
7.多余的装饰选项,进关卡之前可以选择几个装备,都是头盔,然而根本看不清楚,玩的时候也没人会多看主人公一眼

author: {'steamid': '76561198049129124', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 10, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9, 'last_played': 1708911655}
review: I'm sorry but i don't think this is even worth 49 cents. The controls are so sensitive it's nearly impossible to prevent the character from running into an enemy or saw blades and instantly dying cuz 1 hit by saws and you're dead. The screen shakes when you shoot making it difficult to hit an enemy. You start off with very little ammo so you better find some quick but don't get it until you use your 20 rounds up that you have cuz you can't carry more. Then, the illuminated area gets smaller and makes it even harder. I unlocked one gun. After that it just seemed like more of the same thing but with a different gun.

author: {'steamid': '76561198133508899', 'num_games_owned': 580, 'num_reviews': 174, 'playtime_forever': 12, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 12, 'last_played': 1708668421}
review:
[h2] un juego relativamente corto. en menos de 10 minutos desbloqueas todas las armas, no hay mas niveles ni zonas ni nada. solo es un arcade genérico mas en  steam es divertido los primeros 2 minutos, después se vuelve demasiado aburrido, soso e infumable. entiendo que el dev quiso añadir dificultad artificial en un escenario "oscuro" y con poca visión y trampas en el entorno. sin embargo como mencione antes. el juego no es mas que los primeros 2 minutos de juego. literal el juego es un morir, repetir, morir y repetir en un mismo escenario. 
me hubiese gustado recomendarlo para jugarlos en un momento de ocio antes de salir de casa (en esos momentos cuando dices: ah mira tengo 10 minutos disponibles!) pero no en lo absoluto. creo que valdría mas la pena perder el tiempo jugando brawl stars u cualquier otro juego mas casual.
creo que ni comprándolo en oferta o regalado vale la pena.  2/10  [/h2]

author: {'steamid': '76561199487869876', 'num_games_owned': 57, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 54, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 54, 'last_played': 1708551116}
review:
Один из примеров ПРОСТЕЙШИХ топ-даун шутанов, который дает цели на самом старте, и эти цели - достижения в Steam, каждая из которых, в свою очередь, представляет собой планки количества фрагов: то тридцать, пятьдесят... Сотню? да, сотню из пистолета, и другого оружия, которую на первый взгляд набрать очень просто. На второй, впрочем, тоже. я понял и почувствовал наилучшую тактику всего за 50 минут геймплея, и ЭТО показатель. Показатель качества игры. я не заметил, как потратил целый час своей жизни, на шутер, контент в котором заканчивается БУКВАЛЬНО через 40 минут. 

Я давно искал подобную игру, это хорошая идея для игры как в соло, так и с друзьями, если в компании один ноутбук, можно посоревноваться в количестве килов за раунд, к примеру... были бы друзья

author: {'steamid': '76561198077412171', 'num_games_owned': 131, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 35, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 35, 'last_played': 1708273124}
review:
Simple Top down shooter.
There are several different weapon you can choose from. Starting from Pistol and unlock them by killing 30 zombies with a specific weapon.
There is ammunition, health-kits and batteries spreading on the ground. (Don't worry, they will re-spawn somewhere in the stage.) So you have to explore around to find them.
Beware your surroundings. Your vision/lights will getting smaller of each passing seconds. (Require battery)
Enemies are basicaly zombies and traps around the stage."You still might die a lot" For each deaths, the traps and items spread randomly.

Achievements: This game is kind of simple and straight forwards.
Leaderboard: Highscore ingame

review: Black Z: Slaughterhouse Edition is just a regular top-view zombie shooter, which doesn't differ much from those web games you could find on such websites as Armor Games and Flonga when you were a minor. The only difference is that you have to pay one dollar to play the game. However, considering the small price and the fact you can collect all the achievement in less than 35 MINUTES, I reckon this purchase is worth conducting, especially when you're an achievement hunter who wants to complete another game quickly in 100%

author: {'steamid': '76561197985359716', 'num_games_owned': 736, 'num_reviews': 202, 'playtime_forever': 50, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 50, 'last_played': 1668636684}
review:
Jogo de visão por cima de matar zumbis com a dificuldade de jogar em um ambiente bem escuro e cheio de armadilhas, as quais não são apenas para os zumbis!
Além da pressão de sobrevivência, buscar arma/munição, você precisa correr atrás de baterias para sua lanterna, sem isso você morrera rápido no escuro para a horda ou uma armadilha.
Existem outros jogos melhores nesse estilo, mas pelo preço vale a diversão.

author: {'steamid': '76561198211244779', 'num_games_owned': 407, 'num_reviews': 231, 'playtime_forever': 18, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 18, 'last_played': 1703019961}

author: {'steamid': '76561198944189616', 'num_games_owned': 332, 'num_reviews': 46, 'playtime_forever': 137, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 137, 'last_played': 1702710553}
review: 游戏性设计得很巧妙，地图被黑暗笼罩，随机产出光源、子弹、医疗包三种资源，同时存在电锯陷阱、僵尸两种威胁。游戏设置的第一层驱动是不断刷新的僵尸，驱使玩家移动并寻找子弹，但地图上随机分布的电锯陷阱触之即死，又限制玩家的移动性，并驱使玩家寻找光源。光源随时间减弱，子弹也随僵尸的刷新消耗，资源获取需求与威胁达到动态平衡，鞭策玩家在地图上四处奔走。配合带感的音乐，是款不错的小游戏。

author: {'steamid': '76561198352733626', 'num_games_owned': 1382, 'num_reviews': 128, 'playtime_forever': 41, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 30, 'last_played': 1700660938}
review:
El juego no es malo, pero demasiado exigente en como te obliga a moverte por todo el mapeado para no morir. Y, de ahí el no recomendarlo, es por la linterna.

Comprendo que el juego no sería difícil sin joder a esta, lo que implica el hecho de que muere a los segundos nomás hasta que recojas una batería. El problema de esto es que, yendo a ciegas porque no hay nada que indique dónde puedan estar, o inclusive el hecho de que están las sierras funcionando a tu alrededor, hacen que NO sea divertido, sino frustrante. Pero podría ser peor...

La banda sonora está bien, cómprala si quieres apoyar al desarrollador.

author: {'steamid': '76561198361671357', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 410, 'playtime_forever': 48, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 48, 'last_played': 1700597112}
review:
An awesome zombie survival game! Take on the hordes of zombies as you make your way through the dark, trying to keep your flashlight on, mind the saws! 

Pick from an arsenal of weapons like a pistol or double barrel shotgun, the zombies won't stand a chance!

Overall, great and simple game, I do wish there was more enemy variety or difficulty scaling but it's definitely still a good game!

author: {'steamid': '76561198255716355', 'num_games_owned': 746, 'num_reviews': 277, 'playtime_forever': 28, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 28, 'last_played': 1685213222}
review: It's a simple game. You live, you die, you live again. You keep killing hordes of zombies, leading them into traps whilst also fumbling around in the dark. Pretty decent, very short to 100% though.

author: {'steamid': '76561198325967721', 'num_games_owned': 1271, 'num_reviews': 255, 'playtime_forever': 30, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 30, 'last_played': 1697552255}
review:
Suprisingly fun top down shooter with interesting take on resource management with ammo, health and light, as you have to balance those to both be able to defend yourself, survive if you get hit and also so you can even move around in the first place, as light will help you see sawblade before you bump into them with your body and die. As a good design choice the zombies have a glowing eyes though, so not only you can see them always, if you see red eyes disappear without you shooting them, you can deduce where sawblades are on the map, so there is actually some strategizing to this minimalistic game. Hard but in a frustrating way unce you understand the basic mechanics.

6/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198121277080', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 76, 'playtime_forever': 19, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7, 'last_played': 1697187765}
review: Concept of a top-down shooter is cool but execution is weird. You're gonna die more to random spinning blades or whatever than to zombies because your view radius decreases over time and you cant always preserve it; good luck finding items when you can see 1m out but also every slightest key press moves you like 3m. FoV feels really low too and there is no in-game option to change it. And at last if you ignore that 'zombies' are black shapes with red eyes and are just gonna blend in with blood and hit you randomly when your focus is on the other part of the screen then yeah, its a decent game but worth getting only on a discount...

author: {'steamid': '76561198117351074', 'num_games_owned': 219, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 38, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 38, 'last_played': 1696520335}
review:
Gra ewidetnie inspirowana Hotline Miami (co widac po stylu graficznym jak i gameplayu. Prosta, szybka, płynna i przyjemna rozgrywka, jednak czuć w wykonaniu sporo niechlujstwa i robienia na szybko, chociażby zdarzają się momenty, gdzie prawie nie ma do kogo strzelac, bo zombie wchodza w niewidoczne piły (które swoją drogą na poczatku potrafią być sporo bolączką przy niepodniesieniu baterii przez dłuższą chwilę i nieproporcjonalnie szybkie tempo chodzenia przy tak małej widoczności).
Gra jest na tyle mało rozwinięta, że wiecej niż na max 2-3 godziny nie przyciąga, ale są one całkiem miło spędzone.

Zalety:
+ cena (była do dorwania za darmo i tylko w takiej sytuacji polecam ten tytuł)
+ szybka i płynna rozgrywka...

Wady:
- ...niestety przez brak zawartości nie przyciąga na długo
- widać pewne niedopracowania i niechlujstwa twórców

Podsumowując: dla chorego lub potrzebującego po prostu nieskomplikowanej dynamicznej rozgrywki na godzinkę spoko jeśli masz ją w bibliotece, ale nic więcej.

author: {'steamid': '76561198157722947', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2076, 'playtime_forever': 321, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 32, 'last_played': 1707382068}

author: {'steamid': '76561198052516262', 'num_games_owned': 1897, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 28, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 28, 'last_played': 1692661142}
review:
I won't say that this is a bad game, but I don't think I could recommended it just because there are games that do this style better. 

I do think that the map being almost completely dark is a novel idea, the execution just isn't there for me, personally I think a better style would to have allowed the player to stockpile ammo, and batteries, maybe even have the light require the player to hit a key to reload the flashlight.

Something like I made a game with zombie in it, does this style so much better, and really makes a player want to play round after round.

Everything being said the game took less than 30 minutes to 100% the achievements, so if that's something you are looking for that is a plus.

author: {'steamid': '76561198065898682', 'num_games_owned': 613, 'num_reviews': 563, 'playtime_forever': 41, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 41, 'last_played': 1690806764}
{'steamid': '76561198011595325', 'num_games_owned': 2477, 'num_reviews': 929, 'playtime_forever': 62, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 62, 'last_played': 1692467502}
review:
Blackout Z: Slaughterhouse Edition é um Top-Down Shooter simples, mas bem desafiador e interessante, você está em um sala escura cheia de armadilhas e zumbis, mas conforme o tempo passa a "área" da sua lanterna diminui te obrigando a procurar pilhas (além de munição e vida) enquanto evita as armadilhas, se quiser sobreviver por algum tempo você realmente têm que aproveitar a luz pra evitar as armadilhas que pra mim são o real inimigo do jogo (hahaha). Não encontrei bugs e acho o jogo um bom passatempo. 
--------------------------
Blackout Z: Slaughterhouse Edition is a simple Top-Down Shooter, but very challenging and interesting, you are in a dark room full of traps and zombies, but as time goes by the "area" of your flashlight decreases forcing you to look for batteries ( plus ammo and life) while avoiding the traps, if you want to survive for a while you really have to take advantage of the light to avoid the traps which for me are the real enemy of the game (hahaha). I didn't find any bugs and I think the game is a good pastime.

author: {'steamid': '76561198329734482', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 33, 'playtime_forever': 294, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 294, 'last_played': 1690135793}
review:
2/10

In this game, you're a random guy in a random place shooting zombies and dodging saws. Your vision continuously decreases, which can be countered by collecting batteries. Ammunition is limited and needs to be replenished. Of course, you can restore your health using medpacks. Furthermore, on the small-sized map, you will come across rotating saws that can kill you if you get too close.

This is a terrible game because there really isn't much content in it. Yeah, it's challenging because it's fast paced, but it's far from additive.

author: {'steamid': '76561198099606200', 'num_games_owned': 875, 'num_reviews': 292, 'playtime_forever': 42, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 42, 'last_played': 1684414264}
review: Blackout Z: Slaughterhouse aslında bi' kaç oyun mantığının birleştirilip minimalize edilerek sunulmuş bir oyun. Amacınız akın akın üzerinize gelen zombilerden kendinizi korumak. Tabi bunu yaparken sağlığınıza, kurşununuza ve el fenerinizin piline dikkat etmeli, zombilerden kaçarken engellere takılıp ölmemelisiniz. İlerledikçe diğer silahların kullanımı açılıyor, yavaş yavaş oyun keyif veriyor fakat tam da keyif almaya başladığınızda oyunun tekrara düştüğünü fark ediyorsunuz. Max 45 dakika kendini oynatabilecek bir oyun. Zaman geçirmek için denenebilir.

author: {'steamid': '76561198963810920', 'num_games_owned': 753, 'num_reviews': 259, 'playtime_forever': 43, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 43, 'last_played': 1681967177}
review:
Blackout Z: Slaughterhouse Edition Review
Rating: 1/10
This is pretty much a terrible game with zombies, i know a bloody shocker. Guns have ammo but ammo does not stack so you can pickup it by accident while you are running away from zombies and whilst you already have the ammo. Then we have the horrible feature of a light orb around you as far as i know i am not an angel and i know its supposed to be a flashlight but that's not how a flashlight shines that's for sure so guess the developers never used a flashlight in their lives, and the light orb is useless since it shrinks faster then your willy after the special activity program and you are  in a meat factory with random saws in middle and on the edges of the arena,i guess some psycho trapped you in and now you play for a few seconds and die. Getting all achievements was a breeze with a few tricky buggers but i have to say the game was kinda just bad and not the good kinda bad. Zombies where underwhelming and poorly designed ,weapons felt really bad to shoot and all of them just had the same copy paste shooting animation made to fit the weapon more. A low effort garbage nobody should play. Either full price or on sale. Such a terrible garbage of a game. This can be best described as "The arcade game in a horror movie". So i suggest you go to the store and get a 2$ steak i mean its more money sure but at least you will feel better after eating a steak then playing this game. And that's my review for this garbage and as always remember zombie games have the highest % of bad vs. good games and this game proves it on how bad it is. Now i know some of the folks will say but there are worst games on steam and i know that, but i am reviewing this not something else so everyone saying there are worst games then this after reading this review just remember there is a high chance you like to watch cat girls online. And i don't blame you,the love cat girls can give is better then a love of a woman most of the time only problem is they are not real but hey the way technology is going they will be real in a few decades time no problem .

author: {'steamid': '76561199000475092', 'num_games_owned': 142, 'num_reviews': 88, 'playtime_forever': 241, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 66, 'last_played': 1706931582}
review:
O jogo em si é divertido, mas na minha visão poderia ser melhor com algumas coisas, como a visão q é muito pequena e diminui de forma rapida, o jogo tbm é lotado de armadilhas por td canto, faz com q vc morra por bobeira mesmo tando com a lanterna cheia ou nn, os zumbis podem entrar dentro de vc e mesmo q vc atire, ele nn sai de vc, ent vc vai lá, se movimenta pra atirar nele e sem quere morre pra algo q dps q a camera da zoom out e clareia, mostra q vc morreu pra uma armadilha sacana no meio do nd.

eu acho q o conceito de ser uma luzinha ao redor do personagem é legal, mas seria bem mais interessante  se a lanterna dura se mais, o visão do personagem nn se basease apenas nesse circulo, e sim na direção aonde ele olha, sendo bem melhor o uso das pilhas numa lanterna, a nn ser q seja um lampião movido a bateria duracell q acaba rapido pra kct e eu nn to sabendo, só mudando essa forma de olhar o cenario ficaria mais divertido.

Agr umas ideias ai pros devs caso eles queiram atualizar o jogo:
Melhorar a lojinha do jogo, colocar mais armas, personalizar elas de modo q deixe vc melhorar sua arma com o tempo de jogo, tipo colocar pente estendido na AK,, miras, essas coisa de boiola, tbm seria massa um modo com 2 players ou mais, sendo lan ou em servers mesmo, e o mapa ser maior, colocar chapeis q façam diferença no jogo, tipo, magina q foda seria se tivesse o chapéu de visão noturna q funciona, mas q só dá pra compra se tu fizer algo mt foda, sla, colocar boses? ou colocar ordas, acho q seria legal fazer o modo principal do jogo vira o de orda e o segundario ser um endlees mode, pd ter tbm um modo de boss rush, ia ser foda, tbm poderia colocar pra comprar outros tipos de lanternas, da pra cmc com um lampião vei broxa, e ir comprando outros tipos de lanternas q da upar ela, fazendo ela ter mais duração, mais alcance de visão, coisa assim.

enfim, eu gostei do jogo, mas ele tem pouco conteúdo e umas coisinhas paia como a lanterna broxa e os zumbi me penetrar no fds.

Parcialmente Gozavel.

author: {'steamid': '76561198281298850', 'num_games_owned': 627, 'num_reviews': 51, 'playtime_forever': 11, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11, 'last_played': 1676331114}
review:
Blackout Z: Slaughterhouse Edition est un jeu de survie , Dans ce jeu les joueurs sont plongés dans un monde post-apocalyptique rempli de zombies et doivent se battre pour survivre. graphiquement c'est  en 3D avec une esthétique sombre et réaliste
l'histoire il y en a pas  Les joueurs doivent simplement essayer de survivre le plus longtemps possible face à des vagues de zombies qui deviennent de plus en plus difficiles à combattre avec le temp.
Les joueurs doivent gérer leur santé, leur faim et leur soif tout en évitant les zombies et en cherchant des armes et des munitions pour se défendre, Les combats sont intenses et violents, avec des animations fluides qui ajoutent une dimension réaliste aux affrontements. il y a une possibilité d'améliorer les compétences du personnage et d'acquérir de nouveaux équipements. Cela ajoute une dimension de progression au jeu qui peut être très satisfaisante.

Cependant j'ai pas aimé Les commandes
enfin Blackout Z c'est  Un mini-jeu avec un bon gameplay mais un contenu vide, je le recommande Si vous êtes un fan de jeux de survie et que vous cherchez une expérience de combat intense vous pourriez l'apprécier

review:
Na plus wymuszenie ciągłej dynamiki ruchu. Na minus niedopracowane elementy otoczenia (hitboxy), sporo bugów, mała różnorodność asortymentu oraz brak innej mapy. Krótka rozgrywka na godzinę dla wymaksowania osiągnięć jak znalazł. Dalej nie ma motywacji do gry poprzez postępujące znużenie.

author: {'steamid': '76561198030784015', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11208, 'playtime_forever': 361, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6, 'last_played': 1706662773}
review:
Blackout Z: Slaughterhouse Edition is a construction kit copy + paste game.   The "developer" used the craptastic GameMaker Studio video game construction kit, copying + pasting and arranging low quality/pixel assets, using premade level design tools so they could slap together a craptastic shovelware top down wave survival twin stick shooter.  Shoot waves of zombies or whatever, the only twist here is that the lighting is bad.  Yeah that's supposed to be a "feature".  Truly, this is trash, but hey, at least it's not another Russian asset flip scam.  This seems to be a genuine, if terrible, attempt at making a game.

A strong argument can be made that construction kits like GameMaker Studio should never be used to make games for profit, as the "developer", NukGames has done here.  These construction kits are intended to teach people some of the basic principles of game development, and to make small demos to pass around with friends.  They're not intended to replace to actual work of real, professional game developers.  So it's inappropriate when amateurs try to use these for profit, without any actual, real game development effort taking place.  This doesn't result in products that have any real meaningful value for gamers.

Taking this shovelware seriously as if it was a genuine attempt to make a game, it doesn't meet basic minimum requirements that most PC gamers expect as standard.

A choice was made to use obsolete, decades old retro pixel "art" as a substitute for contemporary PC graphics.  It's unclear if this is due to lack of budget or talent, regardless, the overall visual quality of the game is extremely low as a result.

There's no options to change the resolution for the game or customise the graphics settings.  There's no way for gamers to ensure this is running at the native resolution of their displays... there's no guarantee this game will look right on any PC as a result of this hamfisted design decision.  There's no way for gamers to try improve the low quality graphics. 

The controls can't be customised, which will be an annoyance for many, but it can also render the game unplayable for differently-abled gamers.

Some of the defects in the game can be attributed to the choice of using the GameMaker Studio construction kit/toolset.  This is a very poor quality toolset favoured by amateur developers as it's cheap and requires little in the way of development skill, but unfortunately has very limited capabilities.  Just as you can't make a silk purse out of a sows ear, you can't make a great video game if you use a terrible engine.  GameMaker Studio is most commonly used to make retro pixel shovelware and cash grabs.

These technical defects push this game below acceptable standards for any modern PC game.

Blackout Z: Slaughterhouse Edition is relatively cheap at $1 USD, but it's not worth it. Given the defects and quality issues with the game, coupled with the unrealistic price, this is impossible to recommend.

author: {'steamid': '76561198021422660', 'num_games_owned': 3620, 'num_reviews': 1228, 'playtime_forever': 39, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 39, 'last_played': 1676027825}
review:
[h1] Могло быть вполне бодрое мочилово зомбей в отрыве от крупных игр про зомбей, но излишняя пиксельность вкупе с примитивностью исполнения отталкивают  [/h1]

А так аркадка вроде бодрая, но излишне дохлый фонарик утомляет - заканчивается батарейка за пару секунд. Также непонятно откуда берутся зомби, если вокруг находятся циркулярные пилы. Можно было бы закольцевать карту в духе того же кримсонленда. 

Оружие вполне типичное. По карте периодически появляются припасы - аптечка, патроны и батарейки. Раскиданные везде циркулярки утомляют и убивают.

Реализация довольно кривая и не смогли на русский язык добавить тот же шрифт. Достижения относительно простые, но даже на оригинальном языке не вся информация помещается на экран. 

[h1] По итогу могла бы получиться неплохая аркадка на счёт про зомбей - некая отдушина от сложных зомби игр, но кривизна исполнения отталкивает. Может кому за небольшую цену и понравится.  [/h1]

review: Gra bardzo krótka, przejście jej na 100% zajmuje do 120 minut, ale polecam ją, ponieważ w swojej prostocie zawiera całą swoją siłę.

review: Fun little top-down shooter. The game isn't very challenging or detailed but it makes up for those flaws by having good replayability and addictive gameplay. It's also good for completionists as all achievements can be easily obtained under an hour.

author: {'steamid': '76561197985000150', 'num_games_owned': 578, 'num_reviews': 101, 'playtime_forever': 15, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 15, 'last_played': 1667627865}
review: I'm glad I got this for free as it's not worth money. It's a top-down "survive as long as you can" shooter. Actually, it's not for as long as you can, it's for as long as your extremely limited ammo and your extremely limited torch life lasts. You don't have to play for long to realise a game of this type is no fun if you can't see what you're doing.

author: {'steamid': '76561198196818634', 'num_games_owned': 239, 'num_reviews': 94, 'playtime_forever': 15, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 15, 'last_played': 1625226893}
review: Blackout Z ; slauhgter edition to najlepsza gra w jaką grałem. Zmieniła ona moje życie o 390 stopni...Naprawde ZAJEFAJNA gra POLECAM z całą rodziną od tego czasu moje życie stało się lepsze codziennie znajduje pieniądze na ulicy raz nawet znalazłem 2137zł.Grałem w to bardzo długo poniewasz gra jest bardzo rozbudowana i wciągająca.Jest dużo broni i rodzajów przeciwników i jest też dużo Bossów.Fajny jest również tryb multiplayer z bardzo rozbudowaną kampanią z wieloma wątkami pobocznymi.Można naprawde dobrze się bawić przez wiele lat a nawet godzin.Świetny pomysł na prezent na gwiazdkę dla dziecka 2-99 lat.Gra ma bardzo dobre drzewka umiejetności i świetny soundtrack którego można słuchać przez wiele godzin (codziennie słucham go przez snem i w drodze do przedszkola).Podsumowując Blackout Z:Slaughter house Editiion jest grą wybitną i jedynym minusem jest bardzo wysoka cena

author: {'steamid': '76561198147990214', 'num_games_owned': 637, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 39, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 39, 'last_played': 1661263302}
review:
Recommend everyone to try this game out. It's pretty short, if you stop playing after unlocking everything, but until then it can be really challenging. 

You basically need to manage your resources every run, like ammo, flashlight, while also paying attention to traps,which can be a huge pain.

This game found a good balance between satisfying and frustrating. 

Getting all the achievements might get tricky though. You will need some practive, because the game is not easy.

My time played is not realistic, because I play offline sometimes, so getting all achievements took me around 3 hours.

It's a good game, but not amazing or mindblowing. The traps can be extremely frustrating.

Still I recommend it to anyone, because it's almost free, and provides plenty of fun.

author: {'steamid': '76561198030006913', 'num_games_owned': 6544, 'num_reviews': 386, 'playtime_forever': 47, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 47, 'last_played': 1662232685}
review:
엄청나게 심플한 탑뷰 호드 서바이벌 슈터.

시야는 계속 줄어들어 건전지를 먹어 시야를 늘려야하고. 탄환은 저장이 안되고 먹으면 재장전만 되서 결국은 끊임없이 건전지와 탄약을 찾아다녀야 하는 게임.

장점:
- 심플
- 대충 한시간 이내로 도전과제 모두 달성 가능
- 나름 컨셉 괜찮았음

단점:
- 죽는 대부분의 원인이 톱 때문임. 대체 누가 설치한거지
- 게임 오버시 화면 보면 의도한 것 같은데 해상도가 너무 낮아 답답함
- 역시 의도한 것 같은데 주인공 이동 속도가 너무 빠름
- 덕분에 의도한 것 같긴 한데 자살 위협이 엄청나게 올라감
- 게임 볼륨 자체가 크지 않기 때문에 쉽게 질림

플래시 게임 같은 아주 심플한 게임. 일단 추천.

author: {'steamid': '76561198091236194', 'num_games_owned': 702, 'num_reviews': 43, 'playtime_forever': 68, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 68, 'last_played': 1662028168}

author: {'steamid': '76561198429074257', 'num_games_owned': 1455, 'num_reviews': 1354, 'playtime_forever': 21, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 21, 'last_played': 1661942620}
review:
Night, field, the sound of a saw and a slowly dying lantern. But as soon as you step behind the ring of light, thousands of paws of the dead will immediately tear you apart!

[b]Pros:[/b][list]
[*]+ Arena shooter
[*]+ Achievements
[*]+ Leaderboard

[b]Minuses:[/b]
[*]- Cartridges are not combined, but replace the remaining ones.[/list]

[b]Total:[/b]
To be honest, I was expecting a passing craft, which naturally will not hook me - and in my turn I will just roll a negative review on this garbage. But everything didn't go according to plan.
The game takes its simplicity and dynamic gameplay. Hordes of the dead surround you, forcing you to weave through their mouths and severed limbs, maneuvering between the saw blades scattered across the battlefield. And frantically look for cartridges for your empty weapons, first-aid kits - which can patch up your wounds and long-awaited batteries for your flashlight - because without it you almost see nothing.
A nice addition are the achievements that the player will unlock during the battle, as well as new types of weapons - which will require a little sweat. A seemingly simple task of killing several zombies in one run - it can take you three to five or even ten attempts, which will never succeed!
I recommend this toy, it will perfectly help you pass a few tens of minutes.

author: {'steamid': '76561198886938744', 'num_games_owned': 187, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 6499, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2510, 'last_played': 1703725685}
review:
Что ж...
Неплохой залипательный Top-down shooter, с небольшими механиками, неплохо сделанный, но не имеющий ничего, кроме волн зомби, наскоро разряжающегося фонаря, да одной обоймы, периодически пополняемой патронами с пола. Глянул я лидерборд этой игры и обомлел, увидев цифру в 2 с лишним миллиона на первом месте, реально какие-то монстры...
Комплит делается буквально за минут 40-50, (ачивкодрочерам интересно, по любому), в целом, если убрать сильно трясущуюся камеру (хотя к ней за первые минуты привыкаешь), проект сносный, поиграть можно часик, чисто в перерыве между какой-нибудь другой более высокого качества игрой.

Успехов и удачи разработчикам!

Моя оценка: 7/10

author: {'steamid': '76561199105222500', 'num_games_owned': 138, 'num_reviews': 175, 'playtime_forever': 16812, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 16336, 'last_played': 1706987909}
review: zombie

author: {'steamid': '76561198134285001', 'num_games_owned': 2399, 'num_reviews': 47, 'playtime_forever': 36, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 36, 'last_played': 1657427722}
review:
意外很好玩的遊戲。

畫面很簡單，玩法很容易懂，
就是拿著槍在一個到處都是切肉刀的房間殺殭屍的遊戲。

主角的視野會隨著時間的經過急遽的變窄，
大約10秒鐘視野就只剩下腳邊一小圈，
這時候亂跑就很容易撞上切肉刀GG

如果想要增加生存的時間，
可以先跑到彈藥附近之後定點清怪一波，
把手邊的彈藥都打完之後再摸黑移動，
如果有稍微記一下道具和刀的位置就更好了

蹲在切肉刀附近可以避免殭屍從切肉刀的方向接近，
但要小心不要自己一慌就撞上去了，
這款遊戲要玩好的關鍵之一就是要適應黑暗，
成就好拿，推薦這款遊戲!

author: {'steamid': '76561198990316597', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 47, 'playtime_forever': 39, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 35, 'last_played': 1669774448}
review: Абсолютный треш в плохом смысле этого слова. Эта игра — ублюдочный плод изнасилования старой доброй Crimsonland. Вместо орд различных монстров у нас всего лишь один вид зомби. Оружия не так много, и его нельзя менять по ходу игры, вместо этого ты начинаешь забег с выбранным стволом и мучаешься с ним до конца. Казалось бы, геймплейные механики вроде разряжающегося фонарика или убивающих с одного удара циркулярных пил должны привнести в геймплей хоть толику интереса, но ни черта подобного, игра всё равно ощущается вяло и сухо. Единственное, на что она годится, это фарм достижений, впрочем все ачивки выбиваются где-то за полчаса, после этого можно смело оформлять возврат средств. Ни на что большее игра не способна.

author: {'steamid': '76561198061211710', 'num_games_owned': 1403, 'num_reviews': 155, 'playtime_forever': 41, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 41, 'last_played': 1626269558}
review:
[h1]~ Allgemein ~[/h1]

Ihr schaut aus der Vogelperspektive auf euren Charakter und ihr müsst so lange wie möglich überleben. Dazu habt ihr eine Taschenlampe, die sich langsam leert. Und ihr habt eine Waffe, welche Munition verbraucht. Munition und Batterien lassen sich immer wieder neu aufsammeln. Zombies rennen direkt auf euch zu und die Map ist mit Fallen übersät, welche man mit der Taschenlampe sehen kann, um sie zu umgehen.

[h1]~ Schwierigkeit ~[/h1]

Je länger man überlebt, desto schwerer wird das Spiel. Es ist teilweise echt knifflig, allerdings kommt man schnell rein.

[h1]~ Grafik ~[/h1]

Es ist einfach Pixelgrafik. Nichts besonderes

[h1]~ Musik ~[/h1]

Nichts besonderes.

[h1]~ Story ~[/h1]

Es gibt keine Geschichte.

[h1]~ Preis ~[/h1]

Der Preis ist bei aktuell 0,79€ (im Sale 0,39€) mehr als perfekt.

[h1]~ Anforderungen ~[/h1]

Solange du einen Computer besitzt, dann ist das überhaupt kein Problem.

[h1]~ Länge ~[/h1]

Ich habe für alle Errungenschaften ca. 40 Minuten gebraucht. Dazu kommt, dass das Spiel echt Spaß gemacht hat. Aber nach 30 Minuten ist die Luft schon raus.

[h1]~ Spaßfaktor~[/h1]

Echt sehr amüsant, wenn man mal etwas Langeweile hat und nebenbei etwas spielen möchte

[h1]~ Wiederspielbarkeit ~[/h1]

Es ist endlos Spielbar. Man kann immer eine neue Runde starten nachdem man gestorben ist.

[h1]~ Lohnt sich der Kauf? ~[/h1]

Ja, der Kauf lohnt sich!
Wenn ihr Errungenschaften sammelt, dann ist dieses Spiel gut geeignet. 
Aber auch, wenn ihr nebenbei mal etwas zocken wollt. Aber nach 30 Minuten habt ihr den Spielspaß schon verloren und werdet das Spiel nicht wieder anpacken. Allerdings kostet es nicht einmal 1€ und ihr habt für 30 Minuten Spaß.
Wie geil ist das denn?

author: {'steamid': '76561198241278520', 'num_games_owned': 394, 'num_reviews': 47, 'playtime_forever': 54, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 54, 'last_played': 1652961376}
review: Blackout Z to gra która polega na tym żeby przetrwać atak Zombiaków, gra jest bardzo dynamiczna przez to, że trzeba umieć poruszać się po mapie po której są wiatraki i spore fale Zombie, że sama gra jest dosyć szybka. Tym razem nie będę opisywać plusów i minusów, bo jak za tą cene, to nie można czegoś dużego się spodziewać. Ale to co nie podoba mi się w grze to, to że latarka szybko się kończy i bardzo łatwo można wpaść we wiatraki i duże fale Zombie.

author: {'steamid': '76561198193814471', 'num_games_owned': 341, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 51, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 51, 'last_played': 1652911179}
review:
I got this game when the dev gave it away for free on steam in Dec 2020 and haven't played it until now. It's a fun little fast-paced top down zombie shooter. You can resupply your flashlight, ammo and health by walking said resources, use the saws & fans to your advantage, and unlock multiple guns and hats with progression.

The only thing I found annoying was the screen shaking from Uzi shots, but I got used to it. It took me 50 minutes to 100% the steam achievements, but I'd absolutely recommend it for its full price of $1 if you like top-down shooters.

author: {'steamid': '76561198957267045', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 56, 'playtime_forever': 106, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 106, 'last_played': 1610766951}
review:
[b][u]FALTA MUITA COISA PRA SER VERDADEIRAMENTE BOM[/u][/b]
[hr][/hr]
O jogo em si é bem simples e rápido de pegar a mecânica do game, mas na minha visão faltou polir e trabalhar mais nele. Blackout Z é o famoso game de pegar sua arminha e meter bala no que aparece na sua frente, com algumas armas a disposição pra escolher e com uma gameplay bem suave, é um jogo feito para passar o tempo. O problema porém, é que nem passar muito tempo você consegue porque em 1 hora ou 2 em média você faz 100% dele, o que torna ele facilmente esquecível com o passar dos dias. 

A trilha sonora e efeitos sonoros são bem básicos e não possuem pontos muito positivos que valem a pena se destacar. E os visuais dele estão na média do que é aceitável com um pixel art muito simples.

[b]Não consigo recomendar Blackout Z porque em promoção você pode pegar The Binding of Isaac ou Enter The Gungeon por um preço razoavelmente próximo. Na minha opinião faltou muita qualidade técnica pra esse jogo se tornar recomendável, dificilmente vou recomendar para alguém essa experiência.[/b]

author: {'steamid': '76561198028761351', 'num_games_owned': 1321, 'num_reviews': 121, 'playtime_forever': 85, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 85, 'last_played': 1646145737}
review:
Mediocre top-down shooter - 3/10

You shoot zombies in the dark with several weapons while evading giant saws on the ground that instantly kill you. You always have to look for new batteries as the flashlight runs out pretty quickly without them, leaving you in the darkness. It's a unique but very annoying feature, due to the batteries spawning randomly you sometimes just don't find any quickly enough.
Another thing are the zombies glitching through you at times, which is really confusing.
The game is cheap, but the content available is just too small, and in my opinion the flashlight feature is just annoying und unfun. Could have been solved way better in my opinion. The movement speed is also too fast to precisely control it with a keyboard, so I often end up running in the traps, even though I saw them and changed direction.

Ultimately I was happy when I had the game completed.


100%-Achievement-Difficulty: Easy to Middle, depending on your skill in fast arcade shooters.

[code]Check out my curator if you liked this review:
https://store.steampowered.com/curator/42987949/ [/code]

author: {'steamid': '76561198856947187', 'num_games_owned': 132, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 263, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 263, 'last_played': 1645822733}
review:
the game is frustrating at some point (at least if you're trying to do 100% of it), and there's a few things i would like to improve: i don't think the flashlight is fair, when it run out of battery you can't see a thing 1m away so at that point it's just lucky till you find a new battery. but, for me, the almost silent traps are the worst, which you can only hear when you've already saw, i think most of my rage playing this would not have existed if i could at least guide myself trough the sounds (why would be hard enough, i think)

but the most important is that the game is fun! you just nned to complete it to achieve that if you're as competitive as i am lol

author: {'steamid': '76561198961304121', 'num_games_owned': 105, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 102, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 51, 'last_played': 1647836174}
review:
For a game this cheap, I wouldn't expect much from it. The gameplay is simple, you only have to collect items and survive as long as you can, kinda like how items can't be stacked which make the game is a bit more challenging. However, the control isn't really great and the random sawblades serves no purpose other than being an annoyance.

Do I recommend this? Yes and no, It's really cheap and if you're an achievements hunter, you would want to have this game in your collection as most of the achievements are really easy to get. Otherwise just keep saving your money.

author: {'steamid': '76561198052125808', 'num_games_owned': 1128, 'num_reviews': 234, 'playtime_forever': 38, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 38, 'last_played': 1645265650}
review:
Das Spiel ist ganz in Ordnung, um eine halbe Stunde Zeit totzuschlagen, aber wirklich was mitnehmen tut man nicht. 
Ich fand es sehr überraschend, dass es das Ding hier geschafft hat, mich in der kurzen Spielzeit so sauer zu machen. Die Zombies sind nicht das Problem, sondern die Sägen - und wenn ich dem Entwickler einen Rat geben wollen würde, dann den, dass er das Tempo nicht so unverschämt hochschrauben sollte, wenn man die Prämisse des Spiels bedenkt. Geringe Lichtquelle + Instant Kill-Sägen + hohe Bewegungsgeschwindigkeit = Frust. Es ist auch ärgerlich, dass manche Upgrades in den Sägen spawnen und damit tote Gegenstände für den Rest des Laufs sind, die nach dem Motto "Entweder hast du Glück oder eben nicht" ablaufen.
Ich hab offenbar eine ganze Menge davon gehabt, denn nach einer halben Stunde war der Spuk vorbei und wirkliches Interesse am weiterspielen hatte ich nicht.
Einen Daumen rauf gibts trotzdem, weil mich das Spiel irgendwie an Amiga-Zeiten erinnert hat. Ein wirklicher Reißer ist es trotzdem nicht.

review: 是个不错的单机游戏，很考验玩家的耐心，需要在危险的时刻也要保持冷静才能活下去。游戏中的“杀人齿轮”是这个游戏最不可预测的因素，正这种不确定因素给这个游戏带来了一定的难度。在游戏的过程中弹药成为了活下去的要素，时刻清楚自己的弹药以及依靠短暂的“明亮”时间找到重要的物资并活下去是这个游戏的玩点。

author: {'steamid': '76561198013017981', 'num_games_owned': 788, 'num_reviews': 519, 'playtime_forever': 52, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 23, 'last_played': 1640613133}
review:
Un juego que en 52 minutos terminas al 100% y te alcanza para hacerle una reseña. Además de ser corto es un juego mal hecho que ni por 7 pesos vale la pena, hay juegos en flash (O juegos gratis en Steam) que son mejores que esto.

Los problemas que tiene son:
*El sonido de las sierras suena cuando quieren.
*Algunos objetos aparecen dentro de las sierras, haciéndolo imposible de agarrar.
*Solo hay un tipo de zombi.
*No tiene multijugador, a diferencia de "Yet Another Zombie Defense" que sí lo tiene..

review:
The saws are bs but you can get all achievements very quickly so eh...Only one that was genuinely kinda challenging was the "Kill 100 Zombies in one run" achievement...Would i have done better,i could have gotten all achievements in like less than 20 min.

Recommended if you want to have a game where you can get all achievements super fast, else avoid this game and its repetitive mechanics. Also got this when it went free some time ago,else i wouldn´t have bothered with it,so take that however you want.

author: {'steamid': '76561197977158883', 'num_games_owned': 891, 'num_reviews': 273, 'playtime_forever': 98, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 98, 'last_played': 1638642320}
review:
[h1][b]ANÁLISIS DE [i]BLACKOUT Z: SLAUGHTERHOUSE EDITION[/i]:[/b][/H1]

Blackout Z: Slaughterhouse Edition es un juego indie de estétitca retro con perspectiva cenital, al estilo de los geniales Hotline Miami (a los que me ha recordado, especialmente por el gore aunque salvando las enormes distancias).

Lo pude conseguir de forma gratuita cuando estuvo al 100% de descuento y lo cierto es que aunque no tenía demasiadas esperanzas en él, me ha tenido bastante entretenido durante más de una hora y media para conseguir el 100% de logros (la duración dependerá mucho de tu habilidad).

En el juego comenzamos con la pistola y conforme vayamos acabando con enemigos iremos desbloqueando nuevas armas que solo podremos utilizar terminando la partida actual y empezando una nueva seleccionando la nueva arma, algo incomprensible, ya lo lógico hubiese sido poder cambiar de arma conforme avanzamos en la misma partida. También podremos desbloquear prendas de cabeza, aunque esto no cambia nada de la jugabilidad. 

El escenario como comentaba antes es siempre el mismo, un mapa limitado con cuchillas en los extremos y algunas fijas y móviles por mitad del escenario. Disponemos de una linterna que nos iluminará a nuestro alrededor durante solo unos pocos segundos, teniendo que ir a recoger pilas constantemente para poder desplazarnos y ver el entorno para poder encontrar botiquines y munición.

El hecho de que solo haya un mapa hace que la vida útil del juego se reduzca enormemente, alargándose algo simplemente si quieres conseguir el 100% de logros como ha sido mi caso. 

El juego es bastante frenético y muy gore: sangre por todas partes, decapitaciones, desmembramientos... una pena que tan solo haya un tipo de enemigo, de haber tenido más variedad hubiese sido un juego bastante interesante. 

Os dejo mi lista de pros y contras a modo de resumen:

[H1][b]PROS:[/b][/H1]

- Lo han dado gratis

- Muy entretenido y adictivo

- El gore

- Recuerda por momentos a Hotline Miami (salvando las enormes distancias)

- Tiene logros Steam

- Se puede conseguir a buen precio de oferta si no pudiste conseguirlo cuando lo regalaron

[H1][b]CONTRAS:[/b][/H1]

- Un único escenario

- No poder  cambiar de arma en una misma partida

- Solo un tipo de enemigo

- Se hace repetitivo en poco tiempo

- No requiere de mucho tiempo para conseguir el 100% de logros

[H1]Conclusión:[/h1]
------------------------
Dado que se trata de un juego que recibí de forma gratuita mi valoración es positiva a pesar de su corta duración y poca variedad. Me ha tenido entretenido más de una hora y media para conseguir el 100% de logros, siendo muy entretenido y adictivo, ideal si quieres jugar algo para matar el tiempo sin complicarte demasiado.

Si mi análisis te ha gustado o te ha servido de ayuda, agradecería que dejaras un voto positivo para que pueda llegar a más gente. También se agradecen los premios. ¡Gracias por leerme! No dudéis en dejar vuestros comentarios o dudas, responderé lo antes posible.

author: {'steamid': '76561198286349265', 'num_games_owned': 134, 'num_reviews': 85, 'playtime_forever': 77, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 22, 'last_played': 1700931188}
review: Przyjemny tani izometryczny shooter. Założenia są bardzo proste, wcielamy się w ocalałego z apokalipsy zombie a naszym zadaniem jest przetrwanie jak najdłużej napierającej hordy truposzy unikając przy tym zabójczych pił rozstawionych na mapie a także pilnując by bateria w naszej latarce nie uległa wyczerpaniu, w przeciwnym wypadku skończymy z bardzo ograniczonym polem widzenia i szybciej zginiemy. Z postępem odblokowujemy nowe bronie i nakrycia głowy dla postaci. Mamy też sporo osiągnięć do zdobycia. Blackout Z mimo prostoty sprawiło mi kilkanaście minut naprawdę dobrej zabawy, nie jest to nic wielkiego i odkrywczego ale za taką cenę i jeśli ktoś szuka fajnej strzelanki do wyczilowania się moim zdaniem warto.

author: {'steamid': '76561199216281410', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 12, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 12, 'last_played': 1636171900}
review:
I guess one could say that you get what you pay for, but I've bought even cheaper titles with more variety and a greater ability to induce interest than this game.
There are bullets to refill your ammo, batteries for renewing your torch's light and med-kits for refilling your life, and that's all with the items in the game.
Zombies come at you from all directions and lethal fan blades surround the play area and are the real threat that will kill you most of the time due to the fact that you just cannot see them as your torch fails you.
You will be dead in a less than a minute most of the times and will lose interest in the game, probably forever, in less than 5 minutes I'm afraid...

author: {'steamid': '76561198025089345', 'num_games_owned': 2174, 'num_reviews': 2934, 'playtime_forever': 8, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8, 'last_played': 1636089075}

review:
I decided to play a bunch of games that i got free. Another game which i also a got free is called "Yet anothother Zombie Defence" It is almost the same as this except they made it permenantly free and it even has a multiplayer and i guess even a few additional features (give or take). 

This game is the same price as a bag of crisps. Save your leftover steam money on some stupid tf2 cosmetics rather than this.

author: {'steamid': '76561198379664807', 'num_games_owned': 130, 'num_reviews': 92, 'playtime_forever': 118, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 118, 'last_played': 1633631095}
review:
Відверто кажучи це творіння отримало б від мене негативну оцінку "як два пальці об асфальт".
НО:
[b] Жан [/b]: вона дісталась мені безкоштовно.
[b] Клод [/b]: доступна ціна, без знижок.
[b] Ван [/b]: розробнику респект, я налічив ~10 забавок в стімі, а це вже титанічна праця.
[b] Дам [/b]: гемплейно затягує.
Тому, цей палець не опуститься вниз, хіба вломлю :D.
5/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198256685939', 'num_games_owned': 160, 'num_reviews': 67, 'playtime_forever': 111, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 111, 'last_played': 1632978461}
review:
--Para quem esse jogo foi desenvolvido?
( ) Espermatozoides
( ) Crianças
(x) Tudo e todos
( ) Adolescentes
( ) Adultos
( ) Pessoas que conhecem a morte

--Texturas, Gráficos, Lindeza?
(x) Parece com os gráficos dos jogos do Atari
( ) 220 x 120p
( ) Meia boca, tem piores
( ) Dentro da média atual
( ) Quase um GTA V
( ) Um Red Dead Redemption 2
( ) Isso veio de outra dimensão

--Falhas
( ) Isso é uma falha
(x) Bug pra todo lado, tipo tiro em favela no Rio
( ) Muita falha mas dá pra jogar
( ) Bugs que são legais e não atrapalham
( ) Sem falhas
( ) Esse jogo saiu perfeito do forno

--É difícil?
( ) Basta assistir o jogo
( ) Zera com uma guitarra
(x) Pega logo as manha, mas sempre normal
( ) Bem desafiador, as vezes difícil
( ) Parece Dark Souls
( ) É necessário morrer (de verdade) pra zerar

--Tem uma história?
(x) Não, um Pubg da vida
( ) tem história só pra não dizer que não tem
( ) Dá pra gostar da história, se esforçando
( ) Consegue te arrancar uma lágrima ou duas
( ) Dava pra fazer um livro nível Harry Potter
( ) Deveria constar no currículo do Ensino médio
( ) Nível Red Dead Redemption 2

--Áudio, músicas
( ) Nível do Rock Brasileiro
(x) Jogue mutado
( ) Dá pra escutar
( ) Legalzinho
( ) Os caras capricharam no áudio
( ) Baixe a play list pra escutar no ônibus
( ) Toque o tema no seu casamento

--Trambolho necessário pra rodar
(x) Nokia 1995
( ) Um PC com uma placa de vídeo do tempo da vovó
( ) Um PC decente, com uma GTX 1030
( ) Um PC já considerado gamer
( ) Invista no minimo 4k em hardware
( ) SLI de 1080ti
( ) Esqueça, a tecnologia atual não dá conta

--Vale a pena o investimento?
( )Pedi até refund
( )Ainda bem que foi presente
(x)Melhor ter comprado um pastel
( )Vale no máximo 20 reais
( )Pagaria o dobro
( )Vale mais que o resto dos meus jogos juntos.
( )Ainda bem que é de graça.

------------ = Minhas Notas = -----------
Jogo relativamente legal, tem uma mecânica interessante em um modo de jogo pique GTA antigo.
Sem muita história, contem alguns bugs mas nada que atrapalhe muito. Você termina o jogo em cerca de 1/1,5 horas, completando todas as conquistas.

review:
[h1]Overall = 4/10[/h1]

A simple arena based shooter with very basic graphics and gameplay loop.  There really isn’t much to it and it doesn’t take long to earn all of the achievements, but it’s got a good soundtrack and a functional if minimal aesthetic.  Gory, violent and quite challenging.

author: {'steamid': '76561198887848637', 'num_games_owned': 594, 'num_reviews': 304, 'playtime_forever': 6, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6, 'last_played': 1644829691}
review:
[h1] Сложная дро#иль#я [/h1]
Игра для хардкорщиков, крайне сложная игра со своей интересной механикой. Олд игрушка PSP, меня лично не завлекла вовсе, но идея игры прикольна. Получал игру с раздачи, было очень давно. В список игр максимум, но играть, я не посоветую, больно уж скучно.

author: {'steamid': '76561198017725280', 'num_games_owned': 1146, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 55, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 55, 'last_played': 1628614609}
review:
Дешевая и максимально простая пародия на Crimsonland. 
Вы бегаете по ограниченному квадратному игровому полю с рандомно генерируемыми предметами (патроны для оружия, здоровье, заряд энергии), ловушками (моментально убивающие как игрока так и врага) и также случайно спавнящимеся зомби с целью выжить как можно дольше\убить наибольшее количество зомбей.
 Единственное интересное нововведение - необходимость постоянно пополнять заряд энергии фонарика генерируемыми на игровом поле батарейками для восстановления уровня освещенности вокруг персонажа.

Все достижения можно получить за примерно 1 час игры.

author: {'steamid': '76561198194680793', 'num_games_owned': 3045, 'num_reviews': 1947, 'playtime_forever': 117, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 117, 'last_played': 1623677444}
review: Ещё один топ-даун шутер, коих сейчас расплодилось много. Этот практически ничем от них не отличается. На вас прутся толпы врагов и вам нужно их истреблять. Чем дольше продержались, тем больше становится врагов. Единственное, что здесь в новинку, это то, что всё действие происходит в кромешной тьме. Свет окружает только вашего персонажа, небольшим пятачком. А что самое интересное, поле боя усеяно циркулярными пилами. Надо ли говорить, что передвигаться нужно с максимальной осторожностью? Но и на месте нельзя стоять, так как враги прут со всех сторон. К тому же, ваш фонарик постоянно гаснет, по истечению заряда (а происходит это очень быстро). То же самое касается и боезапаса. Приходится не только метаться от полчищ зомби, но и бегать собирать амуницию. И так до бесконечности. Это делает игру довольно хардкорной. Выжить в игре невозможно. Задача одна, продержаться как можно дольше и получить лучший результат. Поставил бы палец вниз, ведь игра однообразна. Всё действие происходит на одной карте, а враги представляют из себя  однотипные полигоны, со светящимися яростью красными глазами. Но всё же, ранее не встречал в подобных играх похожей механики. Рекомендовать не буду, тут уж сами решите. Как таймкиллер она вполне сойдёт, или как +1 в библиотеку (достижения лёгкие, делаются быстро и связаны с количеством убийств и т.п.). Проходняк, стоящий своих 30 р.

review: Fun little game, quick and easy, the kind you get for free and play to pass time or when you need a distraction that doesn't require much brainpower. author: {'steamid': '76561198982481057', 'num_games_owned': 189, 'num_reviews': 52, 'playtime_forever': 83, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 83, 'last_played': 1612778662}
review:
Как по мне эта игра относится к тем, кто полностью оправдывает свою цену, в хорошем смысле. Также эта игра понравилась мне по той причине, что она пиксельная и может энергичная. Это не просто скучная и спокойная стрелялка с зомбаками, как другие игры за эту же цену. Игра, если проходить ачивки, довольно короткая. Но в нее также можно играть часами вечерком, чтобы просто не было скучно и просто побивать рекорды. Хотя я был бы не против и еще больше контента в виде 
скинов для перса, пушек и зомби. Рекомендую.

review:
Es un shooter muy soso, y la verdad es que es fácil, pero si le agregas sierras gigantes en los límites del mapa y que la visibilidad del mapa sea apagada cada 10 segundos no hace que sea un juego divertido, de hecho, lo vuelve innecesariamente aburrido y desesperante, si no eres alguien paciente la verdad es que no lo recomendaría para nada, aunque de igual manera el juego se vuelve aburrido a los pocos minutos aun si le coges el tiro, por lo que de todas maneras no lo recomendaría...

0/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198864861369', 'num_games_owned': 135, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 14, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 14, 'last_played': 1633013787}
review:
Çıtır çerezlik, izometrik görüş ile skora dayalı zombileri öldürdüğümüz, karanlık ortamı olan mini bir oyun. NukGames'in genelde bu tarz oyunları var zaten, alışkınız. Tamamen zaman öldürmelik, mükemmel veya yerden yere vurulacak bir tarafının olmaması çok doğal. Birini beklerken veya tamamen kafa dağıtmak amaçlı oynanabilir.

Çok beklenti içine girmeden güzel vakit geçirebilirsiniz.

Puan: 60 / 100

author: {'steamid': '76561198114587894', 'num_games_owned': 203, 'num_reviews': 128, 'playtime_forever': 55, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 55, 'last_played': 1624299352}
review:
The concept is interesting, Decent top down arcade shooter with a zombie theme.

+ It takes 1 hour to unlock all the achievements.
+ Fun little zombie shooter. Easy achievements.
+ Sure it's hard who doesnt like a challenge.
+ Simple and fun shooting game. There are several kind of weapons that you can choose.
+ Dying a lot because of grinder, not zombies
+ Fun, Cheap & simple! And the music is fire.


- The game gets repetitive as there is only 1 map.
Worth a try.

review: Неплохой индюшный шутер. Спокойно проходится за полтора-два часа на все ачивки, даже при кривоватых руках. Оружия много, каждое по-своему хорошо. Главное - выработать стратегию и не бегать по краю карты, где ваншот от циркулярных пил. В общем, довольно хорошо, на распродаже можно затарить.

author: {'steamid': '76561198996247391', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 25, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 15, 'last_played': 1623956595}
review:
Things I Like
- Interesting Concept
- Randomly Generated Map
- Good Weapon Variety
Things I Dislike
- Managing your ammo, health, and flashlight battery are annoying
- Acheivements are bad
- No real replay value besides the acheivments

Conclusion: this game isn't really worth buying for me, it honestly is similar to a mobile game

author: {'steamid': '76561198049057849', 'num_games_owned': 832, 'num_reviews': 77, 'playtime_forever': 51, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 51, 'last_played': 1622509409}
review:
This game is to the point: kill zombies before they kill you.  It is extremely cathartic and satisfying to play.

Oh yeah, and you will constantly be running out of resources.  Just keep moving and collecting resources to keep yourself going and you will get the hang of this game in no time.  Definitely a strong learning curve to really master this game and get up on the leaderboards, but it is a pretty fun time.  Pick it up if you need a filler for all those games with play queues (looking at you League of Legends).

author: {'steamid': '76561198930703501', 'num_games_owned': 25, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 55, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 55, 'last_played': 1621872936}
review:
Прошел на все Ачивки за час.
Просто бесплатная убивалка времени и довольно неплохо сделана
Но это резкое передвижение персонажа чутка подбешивает, но тогда бы прошел за минут ~40

Тактика (кто хочет ачивки) просто собирайте все что плохо лежит и бегайте (желательно непродолжительными рывками, но не слишком частыми). Штука в том что при сборе какого то предмета снабжения (Батарейка, патроны, аптечка) ее копия спавнится в другом месте, а так как нужно постоянно быть в движении, вам это будет очень полезно.

Для бесплатной игры довольно не плохо (7/10 батареек),

author: {'steamid': '76561198014704153', 'num_games_owned': 366, 'num_reviews': 234, 'playtime_forever': 9, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9, 'last_played': 1620721124}
review:
People shouldn't be able to sell games of such low quality. I think I got this for free as I certainly wouldn't buy a game like this even if it was 5cents.

Not much to it, not at all fun to me. Insanely fast moving zombies, not being able to see if you can't get batteries quick enough and it's too easy to die on saw blades as they end up not being easy to see or hear. I at least gave it a try and can't stand playing it even to try and get achievements.

I'd rate this game 0/10 Not worth it as it's likely to make you feel even more bored than you already are if you are playing this because you're bored.

author: {'steamid': '76561198435149538', 'num_games_owned': 148, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 44, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 44, 'last_played': 1618874215}
review:
[i]Blackout Z: Slaughterhouse Edition[/i] it's a small 2D game where you are in a room full of traps with zombies and you need to survive while your flashlight slowly runs out of battery. This game remembers me of the old flash web games and there is no story or any context.

[h1]Sounds[/h1]

The music is simple and fits the game/ambiance. The sounds are well-made. Overall we got what is expected from the price.

[h1]Controls[/h1]

The controls are simple, but I did not enjoy the gameplay, at least in the first 10 minutes. It's hard to control your character because you are fast. It's hard and uncomfortable to move small distances. Later, I ended up accustomed to the controls.

[h1]Content[/h1]

This game is short. I completed all the achievements in 45 minutes, and on the community content, you can find people that did get it all in 30 minutes. But this is not necessarily a bad thing. For some people that want to boost their account's stats, this game is perfect.

This game has not that much content. You chose one weapon from five before playing and you can not change it while you are alive. There is only one map with some annoying traps, and you need to constantly look around to get ammo, battery, and aid kits.

[h1]Conclusion[/h1]

Is this game worth buying? Even though I got it while it was free, I think that it is worth buying it. You can wait and get it at a 50% discount. While you can play some random flash game similar to this for free, playing this game supports one small developer.

author: {'steamid': '76561198017967750', 'num_games_owned': 1538, 'num_reviews': 1327, 'playtime_forever': 5, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5, 'last_played': 1618673951}
review:
There is not much in the game. It's just incredibly hard because someone decided that speed of this game is very high, while your vision constantly goes down (which you need to counter by picking up batteries), ammo is running out (pickup ammo) and health is being taken by zombies... (of course, medpacks).
At the same time on your limited-size map you'll encounter spinning traps, which will have you killed while being too close. 

What seems to be mines or grenades, in "weapon choice" menu is actually... hats.
This game offers Flash-like based games that were for free and online years ago.

author: {'steamid': '76561198316800721', 'num_games_owned': 220, 'num_reviews': 167, 'playtime_forever': 202, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 93, 'last_played': 1707099382}
review: Show demais, tem uma dificuldade muito grande, o cenário é extremamente pequeno, a luz da lanterna acaba quase instantemente, balas acabam rapidamente e pode ser morto por serras ao seu redor, porém é necessário e obrigado ficar toda hora se movimento, tentando achar bateria, munição e vida. São exigidos mortes e pontuação para desbloquear armas e itens, mas são de boas quando você pega o jeito, depois o jogo foca ter a maior pontuação, e por ventura chegar na lista do ranking mundial, que eu acho impossível. E como o jogo diz, se você quer algo rápido, prático, esperando atualização de algum jogo, treinar um pouco de mira e agilidade, Blackout Z é o caminho ou larga de vez depois da primeira 'play'.

review:
O jogo em si não tem segredos. ATIRE e SOBREVIVA! No jogo você controla um personagem e tem que sobreviver atirando nos zumbis, mas as balas não são infinitas, então você tem que correr no mapa feito um louco, enquanto atira, pega munição, pega pilhas para aumentar o alcance da visão e vida. Dá pra passar um tempinho jogando.

review: The proportion of RNG greatly outweighs the skill and knowledge to the game. It is not fun to lose a game because you just couldn't find any ammo/ battery/ health pack spawned randomly. While the mix in of the saws does increase the difficulty by a lot, it only gives frustration to the player, rather than an actual challenge that could provide the feeling that 'alright, that's my bad and I could do better next time'.

author: {'steamid': '76561197983161455', 'num_games_owned': 2263, 'num_reviews': 49, 'playtime_forever': 29, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 29, 'last_played': 1616986447}
review:
Small game, price is adequate for what you get. Not a bad game imo considering that, but would be better if there was customization for difficulty settings (zombie speed, amount of drops in map, player speed, etc), game becomes too repetitive and easy real quick, most of my deaths were on saws, not zombies.

I guess the hard difficulty would be using the smg has it spreads the shots a bit and it takes 2 hits to kill a zombie (20 ammo per clip from what i remember), everything else is relatively easy to use (shotguns lack ammo but they kill with 1 hit and have long range and can kill more than one zombie at times). Rifle = v.easy, pistol = easy.

author: {'steamid': '76561199076479962', 'num_games_owned': 39, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 57, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5, 'last_played': 1674496583}

author: {'steamid': '76561199020302276', 'num_games_owned': 33, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 20, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 20, 'last_played': 1616503224}
review:
Игра с раздачи, которую я думал что не запущу (why not собсна), но решил попробовать.
Обычный time-killer на часик (мб больше, смотря какая цель), получить достижения и "идеально пройденную игру" проще простого, первые минут 5 адаптации проходят довольно трудно, 10-15 зомби и не более, но после становится слишком просто, и результат в 100+ зомби становится еще "слабым".
Если взяли с раздач, то для коллекции можно пройти на 100% за часик, и удалить, забыв о ней навсегда
 (:

author: {'steamid': '76561198096305141', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 430, 'playtime_forever': 465, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 455, 'last_played': 1616466198}
review:
Não recomendo nem de graça.
O jogo não tem história, o lugar é pequeno, pouquíssima munição, armadilhas no meio do mapa, escuro e com pouca visibilidade, ficar procurando munições e cura. 
Isso é uma porcaria, se você quer passar raiva, pode gastar dinheiro.
Conquistas de matar inimigos, sendo que duas rajadas da metralhadora já acaba a munição, ah vá tomar no rabo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198835853196', 'num_games_owned': 228, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 96, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 96, 'last_played': 1615592608}
review:
I'm not gonna lie, I really wanted to like this game but the more I played it the more flaws I found, that in the end really pissed me off. I don't think this game is bad but the faults are too prominent to ignore. The flaws I'm going to mention aren't because of glitches or anything like that. My complaints mainly come from the game design aspect. But There are good aspects to this game it so I'm gonna talk about them.

The gameplay is pretty simple, but not bad. The main things you'll be doing is running around in a medium size arena with randomly generated traps (which are saws) placed around it, and killing zombies. My main problems is the traps and the flashlight mechanic. The flashlight is the glow around your character that slowly dies down and you have to find batteries for it to keep good visibility. The flashlight sound interesting but after a while it becomes an annoyance because of two thing, the traps and how fast the light dies out, which requires you to hunt for batteries instead of the zombies.

 The traps can kill you in one hit, but that's not the thing I necessarily hate about them. The thing I hate is that you can't hear the saw until you're basically in the range where you can get killed by them. I think the best way this could be fix is that allow the audio of the saws to be heard from a little further away. Oh and for the music in this game, it's pretty good. It gives me a "DOOM/Hotline Miami" Vibe which is not an insult in the slightest. But I have one problem with it. Like I mentioned the saws are hard to hear and the music just makes it harder to hear them leading to more cheap deaths. 

I should talk about the gunplay. The guns feel pretty good to play with they a good oomph to 'em. There are five different guns you can use which are the pistol, the micro smg (Just called SMG in game), a Shotgun, a double barrel shotgun, and a AK 47. The only thing that kinda suck is that after getting the AK 47 there's not really any reason to go back to the other guns especially the pistol. Before closing out the review I kinda wish there was more reasons to go back to the game after getting all the achievements, like maybe some gear we could unlock and use, for example night vision googles that you can activate for a limited time that allow you to see better or other things like that for replay value. 

I have to say though if this games gets a sequel that tweaks some issues and gives it more replay value either by having new weapons, gear/gadgets of any kind, or more interesting achievements. I would be more then interested to try it out. But for right know since this game doesn't have much to do in it I wouldn't recommend it, unless you like simple top-down shooter then go ahead give it a try

author: {'steamid': '76561198317983885', 'num_games_owned': 56, 'num_reviews': 97, 'playtime_forever': 55, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 55, 'last_played': 1615049068}
review:
Que ARCADE foda!
O Jogo é um ARCADE de sobrevivência onde você é colocado em meio a uma arena com Zumbis e Armadilhas (Serras giratórias).
O objetivo do jogador é bem óbvio, conseguir o máximo de pontos (ganhos ao matar Zumbis).
O Gráfico é 2D bem bonitinho, os Efeitos Sonoros/Trilha Sonora é perfeita pro Jogo.
No Jogo você vai desbloqueando mais armas que melhoram a experiência com o Jogo.

Super recomendo, vale muito a pena pelo preço!

author: {'steamid': '76561198959269986', 'num_games_owned': 45, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 87, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 85, 'last_played': 1626167817}
review:
Наиграл 85 минут и полностью её прошёл (Выполнил все достижения в стиме). В принципе, больше тут делать нечего, кроме как дальше улучшать свой результат. Ну можно похвастаться друзьям типа такой секой)

Игра конечно прикольная, поиграть советую, но если у вас есть руки, то пройдёте вы её достаточно быстро (Даже возможно быстрее чем я)) )

author: {'steamid': '76561198139292019', 'num_games_owned': 295, 'num_reviews': 105, 'playtime_forever': 19, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 19, 'last_played': 1614701635}
review:
Удивительно, как люди оценивают игру, учитывая, что она неиграбельна. Нереально быстрые зомби, мышь, которая крутится чуть ли не медленнее, невидимые патроны и аптечки на карте (патроны кончаются практически мгновенно), и что самое интересное – пилы по краям карты и не только. И как играть? Для чего мучиться?
Взять условный Zombie Driver HD с похожий концепцией, он лучше во всём. И дело не в графике, а в банальном геймдизайне.

author: {'steamid': '76561198131898722', 'num_games_owned': 815, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 60, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 60, 'last_played': 1613723727}
review:
Это просто жесть.
На очень маленькой карте, ограниченной кучей крутящихся циркулярных пил (так же пилы расставлены и по всему периметру игрового поля), вам предстоит отстреливать бесчисленное количество красноглазых зомби. Одно неверное движение персонажа может привести к смерти. По карте разбросаны аптечки, батарейки и патроны. Патронов, мягко говоря, мало. Жизней тоже. И довершает весь этот ад тот факт, что ваша видимость ограничивается 5 секундами между следующим подбором батарейки.

Из плюсов могу отметить музыкальное сопровождение. Навевает мысли о классике пиксельных игр. На этом плюсы заканчиваются.

Из минусов могу отметить следующее:
- главный для меня минус - очень мало патронов. В таких играх привычно отстреливать толпы зомби. А когда тебе в обрезе дают 4 патрона... хмм... чего б.ть? 4 патрона? серьёзно? Если это фишка игры, то я её не понимаю;
- не люблю, когда в игре темно. И ладно бы темнело секунд 15-20, чтобы успеть подобрать новую батарейку и обнулить таймер освещения. Но 5 секунд... чего б.ть? Встал на месте на 5 секунд и всё. Виден только человечек, которым играешь. Начнёшь двигаться - скорее всего попадёшь на циркулярку.
- пилы. Чёртовы пилы везде. Мало мне было плохой видимости и ограниченного количества патронов. Так ещё и пилы эти кругом. Одно неловкое движение и  тебя раскромсало. У меня даже было так, что за минуту я сыграл раз 15. Просто из-за пил.

В общем у меня горит от этой игры. Если все эти ограничения  в виде плохой видимости, малого количества патронов и циркулярок добавлены в игру лишь для того, чтобы усложнить геймплей и считаются фишкой игры, то повторюсь - я таких фишек не понимаю. В это невозможно играть. Тут возможно только бесконечно умирать, проклиная всё на свете.

4/10 за музыкальное сопровождение и старание разработчика.

author: {'steamid': '76561198010315744', 'num_games_owned': 1309, 'num_reviews': 727, 'playtime_forever': 38, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 38, 'last_played': 1613692783}
review:
Absolutely dreadful...no wonder the dev gave it away for free.

Your flashlight constantly loses power so you'll always be completely in the dark, instant kill death traps you can barely hear and can't even see, extremely limited ammo for every weapon...this game feels more like looking for supplies instead of killing zombies.

author: {'steamid': '76561198441623941', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 26, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 26, 'last_played': 1613592395}
review:
Es un juego para pasar el rato, sin embargo no es para mí. Al ser un juego tan simple y tan "for-fun" es innecesariamente complicado. Lo que lo hace frustrante no es el que te maten los zombies, es que el area de vision no dura nada y te obliga a explorar el mapa, y el movimiento al ser tan rápido, hace que innevitablemente choques con una sierra que te hace instakill por más habilidad que tengas.
En resúmen, no es un mal juego, solo que para el tipo de juego que es, se me hace innecesariamente complicado

author: {'steamid': '76561199096517025', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 59, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 59, 'last_played': 1613493114}
review:
Fun 2 play, tho it's short and stuff. It's also my 1st game whom I can finished quickly, ahaha. Now on to my review.
Positive aspects:
(+) Quite challenging things to do. We shot enemies in a very dark room condition. 
(+) Batteries can recharge our flashlight but it'll only last for a few seconds.
(+) Medkits is capable of healing our HP 'till it's full regardless of HP left.
(+) Items randomly spawned (ammo, medkit & batteries).
(+) Achievements is just very easy to get.

Negative aspects:
(-) After some time, it gets repetitive.
(-) There's not much varieties on guns or hats (which had function like armors) in this game.

My final score of this game is 7/10.

author: {'steamid': '76561198018931400', 'num_games_owned': 626, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 17, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 17, 'last_played': 1613414182}
review:
Wer ein kleines nettes Spiel für zwischen durch sucht ist hier genau richtig. 

[b]Grafik und Sound:[/b]
Grafik und Sound erinnern an alte GB Spiele. Für einen Entwickler und als kleines Funspiel vollkommen ausreichend.

[b]Was gibt es zu tun?[/b]
Das Spiel ist relativ simpel. 

Man befindet sich in einen Raum der umschlossen mit drehenden spitzen Rädern ist. Im Raum sind weitere solcher Räder verteilt in die man nicht hinein kommen sollte da man sonst gehäckselt wird. 
Man sollte sich möglichst dauend in Bewegung halten da die Taschenlampe recht hungrig nach neuen Batterien ist die es auf zu heben gilt. Ebenso muss man Munition und Heilung einsammeln die dann wieder auf der Karte zufällig Spawnen. 

Die Gegner kommen nach einer Zeit immer schneller und nach meiner Meinung auch Zahlreicher. 

Man könnte sagen das er einstieg sehr leicht aber das Meistern doch etwas schwieriger ist.

Wer auf Steam-Errungenschaften steht... hier geht es recht fix  ;)

Fazit: 
Ich hab das Spiel geschenkt bekommen aber es ist auch den Preis von 0.79€ Wert. Für zwischen durch mal paar Zombies schnetzeln und ein Paar Errungenschaften Extra abstauben.  :D
